thought: The website seems to be legitimate based on the WHOIS information and the lack of characteristics of a scam website. There are no unusually low prices, claims of free, psychological manipulation, non-existent company information, uncommon payment methods, or outdated information. The URL https://capitalxtend.com/ is not a scam website.

observation.reason: The website does not exhibit any characteristics of a scam website. The WHOIS information also confirms the legitimacy of the website.
